attributes.action: Stop muslims from protesting when British Troops come home Iraq or afghanistan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: British troops are fighting for this country and its government, yet when they return home from these hostile lands they are met by hostile muslims. And yet the government allows these protests. Its time for the government to show our troops how much we support them, and they can do this by not allowing these protest to go on.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
